long_description.location: Located in Salt Lake, Kolkata, Transit house is a great property with a colourful interior decor and a bright ambience
long_description.special_features: The bedrooms at the accommodation have light colour painted walls with one of the walls painted in dark colour. Wooden furnishings and beautiful painting frames on the walls together make an attractive setting.
